## Summary

A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you're proposing.

## Motivation

**What problem does this solve?**

Describe the use case or problem that motivates this feature.

**Why is this important for KTP?**

Explain how this aligns with the protocol's goals and philosophy.

## Proposed Solution

Describe your proposed solution in detail. If this is a new RFC, outline the key sections and concepts.

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches did you consider? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Impact on Existing Specifications

- [ ] This is a new RFC (no changes to existing documents)
- [ ] This requires changes to existing RFCs (specify which ones)
- [ ] This affects the core protocol (KTP-CORE)
- [ ] This is backward compatible
- [ ] This introduces breaking changes
